name: Fitbolt for Google Chrome™
description: Integrate the Fitbolt workday health & wellness platform into your browser. User guide: http://www.fitbolt.com/guides/chrome
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.fitbolt.com http://localhost; object-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.fitbolt.com http://localhost
